name: No Place Like
summary: Pour yourself a cup, take your time & enjoy. Choose a cup you'd like to have your coffee in & add in whatever else you like. This is a cozy point & click game, where you can go at your own pace - there is no end goal, make as much coffee as you like! There are also 6 hidden little coffee beans for you to find in the kitchen. Remember, there's no place like home (whatever home might mean for you).
